artist: Designer: Larsen Design Studio, New York; Mill: Larsen; Producer: Jack Lenor Larsen, Inc.
description: Vert. rpt. 35". Sketch-like pattern of stems & flowers. Satin batik. Plain weave cotton cloth printed with solid pale blue and partly translucent white which omits pattern points: abstracted pattern of branches in bloom. blueberry cream

title: Memoir On Satin
